column2: mapping = aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g)) + geom_point(mapping = aes(color=species, shape = species))+ geom_smooth(method = "lm") + labs( title = "Body mass and flipper length", subtitle = "Dimensions for Adelie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo penguins", x = "Flipper length (mm)", y = "Body mass (g)", color = "Species", shape = "Species") + scale_color_colorblind()
